Game Saving! .. no Crack needed !!!

1-create an account on windows live games

2-log into windows live games, seems a msn ...

3-After login click Full games left menu, look for the game tynker , install Tynker, it's free, after you install it, click the game installed and look for the key, if not find relog to get first key in the game by clicking .

4 - Uninstall Bulletstorm the control panel and reinstall it using the key of the game Tynker.

5-Then unplug the internet and start the game without using Bulletstorm Crack ... qndo reach the main menu of the game, when you press enter, windows live games will open for you to login, login normally appears lack of internet message, press ok and the key appears to confirm the Tynker offline, clicking ok goes and Ready ..!!!.. will save the game ..
FINALY

For some reason it likes to be rough on my 5870, I'm not sure if this will be fixed in a patch or not but it doesn't make sense to have framerate issues on the unreal engine...

I have i7 920 and 5870

My tip to everyone out there is to not even us any AA at all.

I went back and forth to try to see a difference while in 1080P and I couldn't really see a difference at all.

This way you can play it in max graphical settings.
